text: allahvada, avasana dinayada mata visvasaya tæbu pitisara arabivarungen bohomayak ættaha. ovun taman karana danamanaya allah veta tamanva samipa karavimata ha (ohuge) dutayage asirvadayatada margayak bavata pat kara gannaha. niyata vasayenma eya ovunva (allahta) samipa karavanneya yanna oba dæna ganu mænava! allah ovunva itamat ikmanin tama dayavehida ætulu karanneya. niyata vasayenma allah pav valata samava di karunava, dayava dakvanneku vasayen sitinneya
